CustomField.formula:
IF(Begins(Implementation_Packet_Edit_Link__c, "https://www.surveygizmo.com"), "",
HYPERLINK(IF(ISPICKVAL(Industry__c, 'IT'), "https://www.surveygizmo.com/s3/3464334/AMG-Imp-IT?opportunityid="+Id,
IF(ISPICKVAL(Industry__c, 'Commercial Cleaning'), "https://www.surveygizmo.com/s3/3462274/AMG-Imp-CC?opportunityid="+Id,
IF(ISPICKVAL(Industry__c, 'Real Estate Agent Recruitment'), "https://www.surveygizmo.com/s3/3527570/AMG-Imp-RRC?opportunityid="+Id,
IF(ISPICKVAL(Industry__c, 'Mortgage - LO Recruitment'), "https://www.surveygizmo.com/s3/3527570/AMG-Imp-RRC?opportunityid="+Id,
IF(ISPICKVAL(Industry__c, 'Mortgage - LO/Referral'), "https://www.surveygizmo.com/s3/3530561/AMG-Imp-LRC?opportunityid="+Id,
IF(ISPICKVAL(Industry__c, 'Mortgage - Realtor Referral'), "https://www.surveygizmo.com/s3/3530536/AMG-Imp-RRF?opportunityid="+Id,
IF(ISPICKVAL(Industry__c, 'Material Handling'), "https://www.surveygizmo.com/s3/3462301/AMG-Imp-MH?opportunityid="+Id,
IF(ISPICKVAL(Industry__c, 'HVAC'), "https://www.surveygizmo.com/s3/3464096/AMG-Imp-HVAC?opportunityid="+Id,
IF(ISPICKVAL(Industry__c, 'LED Lighting'), "https://www.surveygizmo.com/s3/3462068/AMG-Imp-LED?opportunityid="+Id,
IF(ISPICKVAL(Industry__c, 'Commercial Roofing'), "https://www.surveygizmo.com/s3/3916052/AMG-Imp-Roof?opportunityid="+Id,
IF(ISPICKVAL(Industry__c, 'Solar'), "https://www.surveygizmo.com/s3/4308874/AMG-IMP-Solar?opportunityid="+Id,
"https://www.surveygizmo.com/s3/3464212/AMG-Imp-Other?opportunityid="+Id))))))))))), "Use This Link to Start Packet Only"))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This is used to start the packet for marketing assets. Client needs to be sent the edit link.
CustomField.label: Imp Packet URL - Marketing Assets
